subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
Lockouts
Organized Labor
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. asked Thursday for more time to respond to the antitrust lawsuit brought by players in the Brady vs. N.F.L. case.
snippet: The N.F.L. asked Thursday for more time to respond to the antitrust lawsuit brought by players in the Brady vs. N.F.L. case.
